metadata.feature_description: Load activity stream content in pages with 'Get More' and 'Show All' options

steps.expected: Activity Feed page loads with initial posts
steps.actual: Activity Feed loaded successfully with posts from SuperUser Account profile

steps.expected: Multiple posts should be visible in the feed
steps.actual: Multiple posts displayed with various content types (text, photos, wiki articles)

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Click 'Get More' to load next page

steps.action: Scroll down to find Get More button
steps.expected: Get More button should be visible at the bottom of the posts
steps.actual: Get More button found at the bottom of the activity stream

steps.expected: Additional posts should load and append to existing posts
steps.actual: More posts loaded successfully. URL changed to include ?lastItem=163 parameter indicating pagination working

steps.action: Verify Get More button still available
steps.expected: Get More button should still be visible for loading more content
steps.actual: Get More button remains visible for loading additional pages

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Click 'Show All' to load all posts

steps.action: Search for Show All button in the UI
steps.expected: 'Show All' button should be visible near pagination controls
steps.actual: No 'Show All' button found in the UI. Only 'Get More' button exists at the bottom of the activity stream

issues: 'Show All' button mentioned in feature description does not exist in the current UI. Only 'Get More' pagination option is available.

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify correct number of posts per page

steps.action: Review code and count visible posts
steps.expected: Posts should load in configured page sizes (MaxRows parameter)
steps.actual: Code review shows MaxRows parameter controls page size. Posts loaded in batches with Get More loading additional content. Default appears to be approximately 20 posts per page based on observation.

steps.action: Select 'Added to Wiki' filter from dropdown
steps.expected: Activity stream should filter to show only wiki articles
steps.actual: Filter applied successfully - only wiki article entries displayed

steps.action: Click Get More with filter applied
steps.expected: Additional wiki articles should load while maintaining filter
steps.actual: More wiki articles loaded successfully. Filter was maintained - only 'authored wiki article' entries shown. Articles from 2 weeks ago loaded.

steps.expected: Empty state should display with no posts and no Get More button
steps.actual: Filter applied successfully - empty content area displayed with no posts visible

steps.action: Verify Get More button is hidden
steps.expected: Get More button should not be displayed when there are no posts
steps.actual: Get More button correctly hidden - only RSS feed icon visible at bottom

observations: Feature description mentions 'Show All' option but this button does not exist in the current UI implementation. Only 'Get More' pagination is available.
Pagination uses URL parameter ?lastItem=<id> to track pagination state
Code review shows pagination is handled by GetListForProfile method with parameters: RowIndex, MaxRows, OlderThanJournalId, NewerThanJournalId
Activity Stream Filter sidebar provides custom filter options alongside the dropdown filter
RSS feed link is available next to the Get More button for subscribing to activity feed
